content.detailedDescription: I am on the phone with my brother,rounding the bend in my street when i see in the northern sky-about 9:30 position ( directly in my line of vision)  what appears to be 5-6 what i assume to be small planes- each w/ what appears to be 2 headlights each,of a red/orangish color...A shimmery almost twinkly quality to the light,and they're in a vertical almost v formation... i say aloud " what the hell is that?!" . i stopped my car in the middle of the street to watch these things.. they appear to be stationary. i think of chinese lanterns ( i dunno why) and cell phone towers..( again,i dunno why) -as i watch these the lights shimmer/twinkle and disappear-as if they went into a cloud bank. i pulled into my driveway-parked and rapidly got out-looking for these things-or the clouds....There were no clouds-or cloudbanks. i was excited-as i had just seen something unusual,but calm ...I did not experience the hairs on the back of my neck standing on end. i was/am more curious as to what it was that i saw. i called fox lake police,lake county sherrif and the faa.The police and sheriff suggested it was meteor showers...What i saw was nothing like a metoer shower.
content.summary: Vertical formation of 5-6 craft w/ orangy lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I walked my friend to his vehicle. in my front yard, i looked up at the sky and pointed out a bright star-like light. i said, "that's got to be jupiter- cause venus is over the horizon." i didn't get the words "-cause venus is..." out of my mouth when i watched this light dim. it dimmed some more, and in a few seconds it was gone. my friend didn't look up in time to see it. 

it was stationary and was around the zenith point of the sky. the sky was cloudless. i watched for 10 minutes after this and did not see any re-appearance or anything else unusual. i'm sticking around to see the expected perseid meteor shower, and i guess this could one of those things.
but why so early? would one lone meteorite be possibly coming in and burn out like that? if it was a meteorite, it would have to have been coming straight at my location to appear stationary as a planet or a star does. what's the likelihood of that happening?
i'm just saying that what i saw.
content.summary: Venus-like light dimmed and vanished.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the meteor shower and i saw a star like object that was moving faster than a plane and slower than the meteor. the object traveled for a good distance before vanishing. at the same moment that i saw this there were planes in the sky so i was able to distinguish between them.

the second one was a couple minutes later in a different part of the sky but not too far from where the first one was seen. and again after traveling a good distance at the same speed as the other one, it vanished. 

both of these object moved at the same speed and they did not have tails like the meteors did nor did they have blinking lights like the planes. we were going to record it with our phones but the object was too faint to capture it on video.
content.summary: 2 star like objects moving across sky.

content.detailedDescription:
It was little past 1am. i came to my house in mali losinj, croatia and went to the balcony looking at the sky in hope to see a meteor. the date was 13th of august 2010 (according to the news the peek of meteor shower).
the sky was clear with some thick storm clouds on the horizon to the west and lighter clouds closer to me west. 
after a few moments of gazing up i saw a group of four lights fly westward and disappearing behind clouds.
the lights were orange-red color, not bright and not points but more like small circles (something like small discs of red-hot metal..Even the color). at first they were in a square shape (like number 4 on a dice) 1 forward, 2 in the middle and 1 back. as they moved the shape became more elongated. it was night so i didn't see an actual object these lights belonged to, but if you draw four circles on a piece of paper and look at them from different angles you will get the idea of the thing i saw. 
the lights were very close together, all 4 in the area moon covers on the sky. when i saw them they were at nw, elevation about 60-70 degrees. they were flying in a strait line roughly from ene to wsw. it all lasted for 2-3 seconds. i don't know how high they were, but they were very fast. there was no sound i could relate to this.
my opinion is this a flying object with four engines on the more or less flat lower part that flew strait but did a rolling movement to the left. it didn't make any sound so it was either very high and in that case inhumanly fast and inhumanly big, or very low and in that case inhumanly silent and still very very very fast. i think it was not very high.
my first impression was that it was some projection from land because it looked a bit like that red laser dot used for indication during presentations.
i called my mother but it was long gone by the time she came to the balcony. it is possible that some other people saw this because it was announced in the newspapers that there will be a meteor shower so many romantic eyes must have been pointed upwards that night.
i felt happy i saw something strange.
content.summary: Four shifting orange-red lights fly in strait line across the night sky.

content.detailedDescription:
I was waking home from work, looking at the night sky. i read in the news that 3 planets would be visible (venus, mars, saturn). so i saw 3 bright lights to the east and assumed it was the planets. i watched them while i was walking and noticed that the lights were in fact quite close to me. i tried to figure it out and realized that the lights were hovering over a nearby gas station. they then proceeded to move above my head and beyond the trees. no sound was made from the craft. i feel like the craft was quite large (about the size of the gas station). as it passed over my head, it was also rotating. the rotation was quite slow, not even completing a full revolution before it passed beyond my view. despite seeing this, i still don't believe in aliens. but i remember thinking that i should not be seeing the object at all, because of my strong belief that extraterrestrials don't exist. i tried to rationalize it by thinking it may have been 3 airplanes in a close formation. however, stars were blocked out in the middle of the assumed formation, which led me to believe it was a ufo. upon some research, it would appear that this "black triangle" ufo is a common sight. however, most sightings include a large light in the center of the object. this is not the case in my sighting.

i have included a 3d render of the object as best to my memory. this is not a photograph.
i will be outside at the same time tonight, with my camera ready. although, i have high doubts of ever seeing it again.
content.summary: 3 bright lights passed over my head.

content.detailedDescription:
Yesterday august 11, 2010 at 8:23pm a large rectangular or possibly cylindrical object appeared in the sky moving northward. at first i thought it was a jet plane but then realized it wasn't as it moved differently and was white in color.

there were colored light on this celestial object but it was not strobing at all. as it moved in a northward direction it did its usual flash of light indicating it's ready to go out of our atmosphere and it is exactly what it did. after the flash of star like light, it just moves in a straight out direction, not up or even curving upward but straight out on an angle, fading a little bit until it just turns into a star and disappears.

i've had over 15 sightings since my first two of this year june 27th which i reported here but now i know that there is so much activity and if i were to watch every night, i know i would see them. this particular sighting was in bright daylight still. it was not dark although it was approaching dusk. i see these celestials day and night and mostly around the times of 8:30pm and also between 11 and 11:45pm

i am writing more about these sightings on my blog at *(link moved to additional evidence section below--sgonzalez/cms). . just trying to make sense of all this. i know there is lots of activity and there is a reason for it. be ready my friends.
content.summary: Over 15 sightings in northen california in 6 weeks.

content.detailedDescription:
Whilst watching the persied meteor shower and as you do looking for meteors. i was watching it with my step mum and we both noticed a bright light comparable to that of jupiter but at this point jupiter was on the opposite side in the sky, noticing it we thought it was a meteor. but it was to bright and to slow. i ran in to get my dad when by the time we got there it was but a faint red dot. the object orginated at about '13 hours right acension' or in the south west it then moved whilst fading towards the north and fully faded at about '10 hours right ascention' or in the west moving from 'hercules' towards 'ursa major'. after it reached the '10 hour mark' it then began to in short move under it's own influence power. it was not an atmospheric craft such a craft would've been obvious.

upon much thought not even space debris could've caused such a bright event and even if it was it could not have faded to such a dim magnitude. it was an exhilerating experience i had to get as many people to see it as possible. after about 3 minutes of flying about the '10 hour mark and 30 degrees up' it seemed to start buzzing like a fly around a light bulb and then instead of one faint red dot i saw 6 they all flew off except one which stayed and then flew over the otherside of the sky towards jupiter at which point i lost all sight of the object and was unable to point out anymore. and at about 00:13 another object in the same place it stopped at 10 hours and 30 degrees it flew back towards hercules got brighter and dissapeared.
content.summary: Flash moving slow across sky fading to faint dot.

content.detailedDescription: My partner and i watch stars in our backyard every single night, it's our tradition.  this particular night there were 2 bright lights flying alongside each other.  at first i thought they were stars when i pointed them out to my husband, but they had no tails on them, then i thought they were satellites.  they made absolutely no noise.  as they flew over us they started weaving in and out of each other and could fly in any which direction they wanted, and quickly.  they eventually flew east until they were no longer in our sight.  their behaviour almost seemed playful.  my husband and i were in a state of shock for several minutes afterwards, we had never seen anything like it!
content.summary: 2 bright lights weaving in and out of each other.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my buddy were in my garage smokin some cigs, he got thirsty so we both went to go get some water. as soon as i opened the garage door and we stepped out, i looked up and saw a bright green circle zoom from above me to behind the treeline in front of me to the west. right away i knew i had experienced a ufo sighting. my heart was pounding and i was so excited. i told my buddy what i had seen, he thought i was playing a joke on him so i made him stand there with me to see if we could see any more. within five minutes, we had counted 6 or 7 ufos. the first one i saw was the bright green circle, it had vanished behind the trees in the west. after that, the other ufos were smaller or farther away, and they were all flying so fast it was hard to spot them out. but they came from all directions. they were all moving fast and curving upward. me and my buddy saw one ufo at the same time, it zoom across the sky from north to south and had a yellowish light with a trail. all the others were seen by either me or him. but the smaller ufos had trails behind them and my buddy described one that was shining bright blue. they reminded me of shooting stars but couldnt have been because they were curving and turning every which way. i couldnt tell the shape of the smaller ufos but they gave off a bright white or yellow light. we only saw one green one and one blue one. i know what i saw. and my friend is my witness.
content.summary: Bright green light followed by smaller ufos.

content.detailedDescription:
I was travelling south on the m6 south of carlisle, approaching shap at about 11:30 pm on sunday the 8th aug. i saw a bright orange light some distance in front of me in the sky. i pointed it out to my partner who is a sceptic and doesn���t believe that she has ever seen a ufo. in fact because of her profession she is very level headed and is trained to look for logical explanation.
as i drove south my partner observed it as i was keeping my eyes on the road. i was aware of the light passing to my right hand side as the motorway bent to the left. from what i could see, the light was much brighter than any star and about ��� to 1 mile away. i could estimate this because of the way it changed position in relation to the moving car. the height must have been somewhere between 400 to 1000 feet in the air. after we had observed it for several minutes we lost sight of it behind us. i quizzed my partner as to what it looked like and she agreed that it was a very bright star like object orange in colour. she then went on to say that it was like a cross or had spikes coming off it. it was hard to say whether these were physical spikes or just the way the light looked. i have also seen recent reports from a similar area (carlisle) on the ufo-uk site describing orange objects with three spikes coming off them.
if anyone else has seen this object in the area or elsewhere then please reply to this post. my partner found it impossible to give a rational explanation of the object as she said it was too high for a balloon or kite and had no strobe or directional lights which an aircraft might. very strange!
content.summary: Bright orange light in sky bigger than any star.

content.detailedDescription:
After dinner a number of people were having a drink at the hotel open air bar when a number of glowing lights (approx 8)appeared in the sky to the north.As they appeared to be over the sea and at quite a distance, the actual shape of the objects could not be ascertained. they formed various formations e.G. diamond, rectangle, and with various numbers in the formations..Somtimes 4 and at one point all of them..The formations moved at great speed across the sky, abruptly stopping and changing direction. eventually they blinked out one by one and that was it. a lot of people saw this and i don't know whether any photographs or video was taken. everyone was talking excitedly about the origin of the lights,the term u.F.O. was of course mentioned,..I can only say that i have never seen anything like this...If there had been only one i might have thought it was a flare..But then it could not have put on the aerobatic display that i saw

                sincerely *(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Glowing lights.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm sitting outside with my best friend "k". just smoken a ciggerate. its about 10:30pm. we are just talking and i noticed this star. it was super bright. thought it was just a planet cuz none of the other stars i see in the sky are that bright. only planes get thats bright around my house. its wasnt blinking red or blue but it was orange and white. i thought oh its probly a blimp or a helocoppter or something else. so i shruged it off. that was the first time i had seen it.

this happenes for the next few nights. over and over again around 10 to 11pm when i go to smoke. i didnt really think about it, untill recently, it just was always there.. so ive done alot of research, looked up alot of stuff on stars and the area the solar system is at. its not a planet. its not a plane. its not a satilate. so this was the only other concustion i could come up with. so i borrow my dads benockuarls. and i freak out. its nothing like ive ever seen before. it was shinny and was glowing orange and white. then out of nowhere it just dissapers. i was floored. ive never been this scared in my life. so i started talking to my friend *(name deleted--sgonzalez/cms) about it. thing is.. he's been seeing it to. and so has my neighbors. so how is all these people near me seeing the same thing? 

so as i had said it dissapeared. the last 3 days i havent seen it. tonight, augest 11th at 10pm i go out to get a cigg, and there it is. and im scared it might actually be real. just sitting there watching me. ive never been this scared in my life. its still there too. hasnt moved yet. i think it knows im talking about it. what am i suppose to do?
content.summary: Bright like a planet but doesn't blink like a plane.

content.detailedDescription: Over the ocean/ coast line. indivdual lights that appeared in sequence to form a large triangle, then faded out. occured around 10 pm est toward the east. triangle was about 4x the size of casiopia and 60 degress above the horizon. one light reappeared. i ran home to get a camera and did not see another. this is my third sighting in this area.
content.summary: Individual lights forming triangle pattern.

content.detailedDescription:
We were lying on the beach on a sunny sunday afternoon, blue sky, few clouds. we were watching a jet airliner which had recently taken off from gold coast airport on a northerly heading (possibly 3000 feet altitude). we suddenly noticed something following behind the aircraft on the starboard side, at about a 45 degree angle from the aircraft, about 200 meters away (large passenger aircraft never follow this closely), and travelling at the same rate of speed. we could not identify the aircraft following because it didn't have any wings, a tail plane or flashing lights. it was oval/cigar shaped and it was shiny like a mirror. the jet airliner flew into a small cloud and then reappeared out of the otherside  continuing on its path. the unidentified aircraft flew into the small cloud and disappeared, but did not appear out of the otherside of the cloud. this event happened over a period of about 30 seconds and we couldn't understand what we were seeing. unfortunately we didn't have a camera available to take photos.
i am a commercial helicopter pilot and quite familiar with aircraft laws, rules and protocol. the following craft we could not identify as any type of conventional aircraft.
content.summary: Ufo closely following jet airliner.

content.detailedDescription:
I was hoping to catch the beginning of the meteor shower over the uk when i spotted a bright star moving north, very high above the eastern coastline here in northern ireland.  it changed directions twice and picked up speed.  as my eyes focused more on it, i realized it was triangle in shape.  after it finished moving in an 's' pattern it simply vanished.  the whole thing took less than 20 seconds.  it was a heart jumping experience.

*(wit's name deleted--sgonzalez/cms).
county down
content.summary: Ufo - (triangle in shape) sighted above the coast in northern ireland.

content.detailedDescription: Well, i was in school, i always see the sky when something seemed very strange to me that he had hera of a balloon, i knew it was not a balloon as asia windy and hardly moved, i almost yame my friends nobody saw, when i started looking volbi color to get, was something beautiful but estubiera paresis as if we watching, i tried but i could not garab, it dates back a few teachers told us that aver and hera a balloon, as i in a convent school i do not want to know anything ...I believe that we must accept the reality ... there is more life in the universe ... but ... there is something they want from us ... when the aliens get there, be prepared ... that aber ba a global impact on our conosimientos and probably in our history ... must accept the real and u all countries go as one!
content.summary: Was windy and havi something standing with many colors and was slowly disappearing from the clouds.

content.detailedDescription:
I do yoga in my backyard every day.  it was a bright sunny day with a few clouds.  holding one of my poses in which i was on my back, i looked at the sky.  i noticed an extremely fast and dark object moving directly over me from south to north.  it caught my immediate attention as it did not move like a bird, was black in colour and was faster than an airplane moving across the sky.  from the time it took me jump up from the ground and turn around to follow it's path, it had already disappeared to the north in a cloud.  there was no sound.

i stood watching the cloud/sky for a few minutes as it really was an unusual movement, colour and velocity (speed).  within a few minutes, i seen it reappear to the left (west), move for a short duration in a straight line (east) and then appeared to move upwards into a cloud and disappear. it did not curve into the ascent but appeared to just rise upwards at a right angle.  it's speed did not change. it did not re-appear in the fifteen minutes i watched after that.  

i could not tell the shape of it only that it was black.  there was no glint of sunlight off it (it was a brght sunny day) and it moved faster than an air plane.  it's flight behaviour/speed when it was directly over me when i first sighted it reminded me of the way satellites move across the night time sky.  fast and smooth, non-erratic.  

winnpeg is on a flight path of jets flying east/west.  this object was totally different than the characterstics portrayed by these flights.

i have no idea how large or how far away it was.  i looked up the types of clouds that were in the sky and as far as i can tell they were the clouds that appear at six thousand feet.
content.summary: Fast moving, dark object in daytime.

content.detailedDescription: I was on the beach in watch hill ri on july 26th at about 1pm.I was sitting in my beach chair the weather was beautiful not a cloud in the sky.I happen to look up in the sky when i notice a perfectly white circle shape object tracking from left to right in the sky. at first i thought it might be an airplane,and the sun was making some weird reflection of light on the planes body.As i looked on i noticed it was getting smaller.I still thought it might be an airplane that was now turning and i was going to get a look at maybe the planes tail or make out some wings,but it just disappeared.I was staring there in amazement when the object reappeared directly below from where on first saw it. it reappeared and disappeared in a split second.I told the wife and kids of what i just saw and they just laughed!! i thought it would be cool to share with you.
content.summary: On the beach when i noticed white circle in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
My adult daughter and i were driving home from a county commisioners meeting and noticed several round shaped bright white lights in the sky.
a central bright light stayed fairly in place while three or four other seemed to be circling the one in the center. 
we did not think these lights were anything we could put a description on.
this lasted about an hour or so, then someone said it may be planes from moody air force base. they said that the ones circling were just refueling the one in the middle.
i didnt buy this, but you can only watch so long, we got uninterested and went inside and went to bed.
two days later there was a report on the internet news about a ufo sighting in texas that sounded very much like what my daughter and i saw earlier in our place in georgia
content.summary: Series of several round bright lights in the eastern sky.

content.detailedDescription: My son and i was sitting on evans road, waiting for crosswalk to be cleared. all of a sudden there was this hugh solid object sitting there, it was moving to our left and went out of sight , we opened our window no sound. then it was gone. we both said did you see that? it lasted bout 2 minutes.
content.summary: Sitting waiting for cross walker, looked up and there this huge object was sitting there. moved slowly behind trees.

content.detailedDescription: *coordinates of wit's residence deleted--sgonzalez/cms. the actual time was from 12:19am to 12:33am my wife and i were out on our back porch.  i was the first to see an object that looked like a bright star slowly, much slower than a satellite, to the south in the area of casiopia.  it was visable for about a second and a half and then went out.  we soon, in the same area whitnessed a dimmer object slowly performing what looks like figure eights.  about five minutes later we whitnessed an object, from out of nowere and to our exclamation, become very bright in the area of cygnus and then go out.  this object made no directional movement.  less than a minute afterward i began to hear the light roar of an aircraft coming into this area of the sky.  the aircraft appeard as a normal inter-continental flight at about 20-23,000 ft.  suddenly the lighting configuration on the aircraft changed which made it appear to much lower in the sky then just before, about 13-18,000 ft with no lights other than two very bright strobes on either side.  this aircraft flew percisely the area of the sky inwhich we saw the last object.  the aircraft was also odly quite for it's altitude.
content.summary: Moving stars turning on and off.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just been released from the hospital; my mother and my friend were driving me home.  we were heading south down power road, stopped at queen creek road to fill a prescription.  as we continued south down power road an orangish bright fireball came flashing across the sky.  it did not look like it was really heading to the ground, but flying level with the ground.  it released a smaller round ball of light that seemed to be just 50 or 60 feet off the ground.  i did not see the light hit the ground; it seemed to go out before that happened.  it was completely silent and lasted about 3-5 seconds.  we were looking east toward picket post mountain.  i think it may have been about 1 mile away from us.
lightning.  no wind, partly cloudy, warm night.  i am narrating this to stacey wright of phoenix mufon and give her my permission to submit this account to the mufon cms.  i wish to remain anonymous.
content.summary: Fireball flashed across the sky but no meteor

content.detailedDescription: I had picked up my daughter (approx. age 25) from the hospital and was driving her home.  her friend  (approx. age 25) was with us also.  we stopped at a drugstore at the corner of power and queen creek roads to fill a prescription and as we started driving south down power road toward ocotillo road i saw a flash out of the corner of my eye.  i looked to the left (east) and saw a fireball streaking across the sky, coming from the south.  it had a short, fiery tail but no smoke or debris was present.  the color was pure white with a bluish tinge.  i thought at first it must be a meteor.  there was no sound.  a smaller white orb seemed to drip (drop?) from it and maintained a circular shape down to the ground; still no sound.  the bigger fireball then seemed to be under power and veered off to the east, in the direction of picket post mtn.  it was under 10k feet in altitude and did not arc toward the ground but maintained a lateral trajectory.  all 3 of us saw this display.  i have seen meteors before and this was not a meteor.  i am narrating this story to stacey wright of phoenix mufon; i give her permission to tell my story as i wish to remain anonymous.  the weather was partly cloudy, no wind, lots of lightning.  all 3 of us were highly excited and screaming inside the car.  we couldn't believe it happened so fast and was then just gone!
content.summary: Fireball let loose a smaller round orb

content.detailedDescription:
Kstp-tv people called me, asking if i had anything on lights reported over st. paul early this morning (aug. 10).  they sent a cameraman, a respected photo-journalist out to witnesses location on maryland ave.  he videotaped about a 10 minute segment of a formation of lights, five lights part of the time.  see kstp website for video:

*(link moved to additional evidence section below -- sgonzalez/cms.

witnesses names are unknown, i am reporting this in their stead.  alert photoanalyst marc d'antonio.

william mcneff
assistant state director
content.summary: Formation of lights videotaped by tv station.

content.detailedDescription: I noticed an unidentified object in the night sky around 11:00 p.M.  i was at home and i was outside having a cigarette when i noticed this object.  i thought it was very unusual for this object to be bouncing and moving out of orbit.  i never lost sight of the object i still see it.
content.summary: Bouncing orb.

content.detailedDescription:
Between march 13th thru 18th, unreal sightings of a white orb (3 times) and orb multi confiquration (1 time). something i said on line perhaps acted as a catalyst. prior to events for days, my hands were very sweaty, minor headaches, pre-cognition of events,(i bought a monocular to carry prior to?). this was designed just for me,,,, although they allowed for a direct eye witness and an indirect witness. the event of the 17th was so close, i saw the silver configuration with a white band of energy rotate around it clock wise.(the atmosphere was very unusual that a.M.,dense and heavy.)

it was a supernatural spiritaul feeling of love coming from it 1,000 times greater than anything you could possibly know in regard to human to human love, i was in tears,(event of the 17th). precepts of reality were shattered.Thursday the 18th,walking home, a cluster with an bright red hue to one side was over my head. this it seemed, fullfill a vivid and unusual dream i had in about 1980 or so.In that "dream" i floated out my window, horizontal, along the side of the house to the back yard and then planted feet down looked up and a diamond or kite shape ufo was directly over my head, thats all i remember of the dream. i think i have had other "unusual" things happen going back to 3 1/2 or 4 years old. also about 1983, in lancaster twice (and only twice in my life that happened) i awoke with a ominous feeling of a presence in my room at night, i was terrified and unable to move.   

telepathy is strongly involved. i think i know what is going on, so do you. 1) the dangerous position of the earth as we approach a tipping point. 2) mankinds inability to evolve as a collective species.
3) the desire from "them" to raise our spiritual and cosmic awareness.

we affect them and vice versa perhaps. please i need to talk to someone who can relate and hopefully explain anything to me. the events changed me quite dramatically, for the rest of my life and yet i want more. 

may god bless us all,

*(wit's name deleted -- sgonzalez/cms).
content.summary: Very personnal multi events, highly spiritual.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on the train coming home from college & it had stopped over killiney bay for 5 minutes. it was approx 4pm on a sunny, clear day. i noticed 2 bright lights over the sea hovering. 1 going straight up about 50 ft and 1 staying over the water, both going up & down in sync & together up and down. at first i thought they were helicopters moving at incredible speed. it never entered my head that they were ufos as i never believed in them, until the bright lights went out. i could see very clearly 2 disc shaped objects hovering about 10ft over the sea. they both rose up at the same time to approx 100 ft for maybe 10 sec then they both did a half loop and sped off in the same direction to the clouds at an unbelievable speed. it was inredible. there seemed to be a haze / distortion that followed them as they sped off. 
as they were passing through the clouds, i saw a further 2-3 more objects follow them in a single line.
i lost them as they went into the clouds. i was gobsmacked. i looked around to see if anyone saw but everyone seemed to have their heads in books / phones or whatever. there was only about 10 people on my carraige.
i felt shocked & moved.
i told my parents about it straight away & my mother made me draw the object.I dont know where it is now as it was so long ago. she wanted me to report it but i was too embarrassed. i didn't want everyone thinking i was a 'weirdo' and made up the story.
that weekend it was all over the irish sunday papers & there were loads of sightings, not just the one i witnessed.
so i never really talked about until recently & now i feel ashamed that i didn't. it takes more balls to say something like that that could ruin your reputation. this is my very first time reporting it.
i have no pictures or evidence but know what i saw, this was not from this planet.
content.summary: 2 metalic disc shaped objects hovering over killiney bay.

content.detailedDescription:
I seen this flashing red, blue, green object in the sky around 11:p.M.  upon closer examination i noticed that it took the form of a triangle which was surrounded by the lights mentioned above.  i took pictures of the object.

the next night, i took a video of the object and then noticed that in the sky it looked like it stood in one place but when i looked into the camera lense, the object began bouncing around like a ping pong ball.  i managed to capture pictures and videos of it.

i remember feeling very curious to know what that orb was and to this day as i still see it every night.  i never lost sight of it yet, it is still here.
content.summary: It looks like a star but red like venus and it bounces like a ping pong ball.

content.detailedDescription: Lying on my settee in the living room watching tv - curtains not drawn i suddenly saw what appeared to be about 9 large round orb lights slowly passing in the night sky, just above horizon level - they were moving in a "v" formation.  i was so stunned - i jumped up and ran through the hall shouting to my partner don to come and take a look - he rushed out with me to the sun room and they were still visible, we went out of the back door and watched - we could hear no noise, saw no flashing lights (it was a very still night - we live in a remote part of west wales).  the lights moved to a single file formation and simply disappeared, one after another - maybe into cloud, but there was no moon, so it was difficult to see if there were any cloud formations.   since this happened i have been trying to research what we saw, and am surprised to find that there have been other similar sightings.   i would just like an explanation.  it may well be that the military have secret craft that they take up and test - but i do not believe this was so.  i still cannot stop thinking about it!! unfortunately, i did not think of grabbing my camera - i would have had more than enough time to have taken photos.
content.summary: Approx. 9 large round orbs.

content.detailedDescription:
Went outside to take pictures of a fire west of cotton lane, looking to the southwest i noticed a big, bright strobe,fast moving object, beyond and above amazon.Com warehouse towards the western end of the estrella mountains.  its movements were very sporadic with the smaller lights being bright prism like.  the smaller ones moved back and forth from the larger one as if playing tag with one another, while in various groups forming different patterns.  it is difficult to explain due to the fact that it was like nothing i'd ever seen before.
i do have an amateur video, taken myself, of that event, 
with my sony digital handycam.
if you are interested in the video, please come and see it, it is saved on my digital handycam and i'm afraid of losing the footage by transfering it to my laptop, as i'm not very computer savy.
i have attached the 2 photos that i have.
thanks so much!!
content.summary: 1 ufo splits into 2 and then little ones going in and away from it, then little ones disappeared, then the bigger one after a few minutes left too.
